website_summaries.verdict: A great value collection of Disney princess dolls that's less expensive than buying all the dolls individually.
pros: Includes 12 different Disney princess dolls with an outfit and shoes
Dolls are well made and ideal for ages 3 and up
Some of the outfits are interchangeable between the dolls
cons: Outfits are not of the best quality

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Dolls! Little Girls will Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful dolls. Their movement is basic but good articulation of the head, arms, and legs. Other joints are not bendable such as at the waist, elbow, knee, wrist, or ankle. The faces are beautifully done. I will would say it is a great starter set for little girls who love the Disney Princesses. The clothing is well made. Some clothes are interchangeable you just have to try them and see. The dolls vary in height and girth. I am pleasantly surprised at the quality For the price, especially for 12 dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Althea Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Doll Height
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with these dolls. They are standard Barbie size.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: The best gift for a young girl
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I bought them for my granddaughter after returning from a Disney cruise. I had planned on giving them to her for her birthday (November) or Christmas. I could not wait. I gave them to her after her pre school graduation. She was so excited. They are all over her room. She wanted to give them a bath but her mother didn't let her do that yet. Hey that makes me grandmother of the year. This set keeps you from having to spend $25 and buying one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: precious

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot day enough good things about this set! My daughter just happened to get Anna and Elsa from her grandmother to complete her princess collection! These are varied in shape and size to resemble what the character might have looked like. My daughter can not play with them enough, even my 1 1/2 yr old son loved them (of course there are small parts, so be mindful of that - I put the small parts in a container out of reach). If you have a Disney Princess loving kid, they will love these!
customer_reviews.author: Libdog

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: These were a huge hit Christmas morning. Unlike many toys that fall to the side after that initial excitement, my daughter continues to play with these every single day. They're good quality and I love the accuracy and detail of each doll.
customer_reviews.author: Nette

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these! They are so much nicer looking than the ones you buy in Target (the eyes aren't as creepy). You get ALL the princesses EXCEPT Ana and Elsa. My daughter is obsessed with these dolls.
customer_reviews.author: K.McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: High quality dolls, low quality clothes
customer_reviews.text: The dolls are fine, but the dresses are low quality and stiff. And over simple. They are not the quality of clothes that you get when you buy these separately in the store. We have some duplicates, so the differences are obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Hyperolius

customer_reviews.title: Beware, not real Disney dolls.
customer_reviews.text: These dolls do not look like the authentic Disney dolls. The attire on each doll does not match to what they are wearing in the movies. Disappointing when compared to another Disney doll that is authentic in appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Carynes Gitler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a great value for 12 Disney Princesses. They were better quality than I expected. My 4 year old loves them. Only 2 missing were Elsa and Anna, which my daughter already has. So now we have the complete set!! Such a good deal, happy with my purchase. Moana is in the set you just can't see her in the picture I posted!!
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN BOYD

customer_reviews.title: Great Dolls, Poor Presentation
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my four year old's Christmas. The dolls are great and are in perfect condition. The packaging wasn't fun or presentable for Christmas. The dolls were strapped inside of a cardboard box. The box is painted pink to look fun and girlie, but I expected there to be a "window" of sorts so that my daughter could see what was inside the box. Instead we had to open this big pink box and kind of unfold it until we saw the dolls.
customer_reviews.author: MEM

customer_reviews.title: Please don't buy this garbage!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! I can't even express my anger with this company. I got damaged NAKED dolls that weren't even the correct princesses. This company has ruined our Easter. I paid 90$ to get screwed over with this garbage. Do not buy this set, there is no quality control and I can only get a refund for my suffering. This is unacceptable and I sent a raving formal complaint to Amazon and I'm not sure how to face my twins tomorrow with nothing from the Easter Bunny.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality... especially hair
customer_reviews.text: The dolls and hair were cheaply made Not the quality I expected. They were for a 5 year old.... after she played with them 1day it looked like she’d had them for months because the hair quality was so poor.
customer_reviews.author: Kacee r smith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful doll collection!
customer_reviews.text: These dolls were the perfect xmas present for my 2 and 3 year old granddaughters. They love Disney movies and have a big Barbie house that they use the dolls to play in...for manny hours!! Excellent doll collection!!
customer_reviews.author: Nessie

customer_reviews.title: Only received 7 dolls... Package of12 ordered
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this beautiful package of 12 Disney princesses for my daughter’s seventh birthday. Imagine my surprise when a package of seven dolls arrived Not including her favorites Snow White and Merida. Not sure how this happened since the order specifically stated 12 dolls would be in the package???
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: Sub par quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the quality of product that we expected. We purchased them as a Christmas gift for our 6 year old as a cyber deal. When she opened them on Christmas we were disappointed in the lack of quality. Unfortunately at that time we were outside of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gist

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece and she loves it! Such a great gift. I was apprehensive at first because of the reviews about the hair falling of the dolls and the quality being less than expected but I found the opposite. Maybe we got lucky?? But those dolls are so cute and very nice quality. I say this from experience because I’ve played with them myself 😉
customer_reviews.author: L Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the quality of the dolls in this package and do not wish to keep the product. I realize tht the order return window has closed, but am wondering if there is an appeal process for that. My mother-in-law who lives in another state had a stroke and we have been making many trips back and forth between St. lLouis and our home since this package arrived. I did not even open it until yesterday. Is there anyway that I can return it for a refund or at least a partial refund? I have been a loyal Amazon shopper for a very long time. Thank you for your consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Robin S. Sprenger

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment of Princesses
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter, stuffed her Christmas stocking full with these dolls. She loved them all (especially Tianna). I think this was her favorite gift of all.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Getting all 12 in one purchase was convenient. Got an amazon deal for $69- well worth it! daughter loves it. considering super glueing the dolls shoes on their feet ;)
customer_reviews.author: Shopbills

customer_reviews.title: Great set to buy when it’s on sale.
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I got these on a super sale. The dresses were kind of boring instead of others I have seen sold in sets like this. The box is solid so you don’t see the dolls through any plastic. My daughters have enjoyed playing with them. For the price well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimber C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: If I would’ve know they were cheap hollow plastic dolls, there’s no way I would’ve paid $100.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a very nice gift box and all the dolls were well made and dressed well. It was given as a Christmas gift to our 3-year-old god-daughter and she was thrilled when she opened it up. Good price for this many dolls.
customer_reviews.author: RSH

customer_reviews.title: All the Princesses for one fair price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas. The box was damaged but I don't think the dolls were damaged in anyway. I like the fact that all the princesses were represented in the collection. I'm sure she will be happy with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Long time Manager

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These dolls are wonderful. They are beautifully designed and the price is very appropriate. I only wish they did a Disney Prince version. My 2 year old daughter loves playing with them. It goes well with her Kidkraft Cinderella dollhouse we also got from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: K.V.S

customer_reviews.title: Three year old loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Bought when it was on sale and was much cheaper than buying all the dolls individually. Gave our three year old a few of the dolls for Christmas and held back the rest to disperse over time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old niece. When I opened it to check the quality I squealed like a 4 year old girl myself! They are gorgeous dolls, Barbie sized (bigger than I’d expected), and could be considered keepsakes. I really appreciate the thought that went into creating each one to resemble the character in facial features/ structure and body type, not just in clothes & hair.
customer_reviews.author: MH B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not great.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is Barbie like. Barbie clothes won’t fit properly because it will be a little big. The quality is not great, they look amazing in the box but once it’s out of it, dresses break, hair is a mess, I don’t think it’s meant to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: LIZ

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My 5 years old daughter was in awe when she opened up the box for xmas. They were all barbie sized Disney princesses. It brought 12 dolls for around 80 bucks. Not bad at all!
customer_reviews.author: Yeremis

customer_reviews.title: Princesses are adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Super cute. Moana is odd. A harder plastic and cheap feeling. The rest are amazing. My daughter loves them. The shoes are easy to take on and off. As well as the clothes... I'm not having to help her every two seconds like with name brand barbies.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Makes Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We got the doll collection and a doll house for our 5 y/o. She is still busy playing... Great gift! Now we are planning movie nights to watch all the stories...
customer_reviews.author: Ana W.

customer_reviews.title: Built well
customer_reviews.text: Good built toys but all Disney crap is over priced not just here
customer_reviews.author: allen brandon

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about giving the set as a Christmas gift but the quality left a lot to be desired – especially since this set was almost $100. If my daughter had not already opened it I would return.
customer_reviews.author: TX

customer_reviews.title: Fit For A Princess
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited about the box they came in almost as much as the dolls themselves. They are beautiful. However, the fabric of their dresses is a bit cheap. Definitely a great find at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Leone

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: This may seem expensive, however you get so many dolls and they are all great quality. My daughter absolutely loved this present!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with these. Great quality and beautiful dresses and shoes. They are holding up extremely well! They are definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dolls
customer_reviews.text: These dolls are gorgeous and look just like the characters. Bought them on sale through amazon so definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great Dolls!!
customer_reviews.text: This a great doll collection. My 6 year old daughter was so excited to get them for her birthday and she’s been playing with them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Baby girl loved them!
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl has finally ventured away from Frozen and Moana and has begun to experience the other Disney princesses - so I got her this for Christmas. She was soooo excited to get these, and has been playing with them everyday since Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Danet A. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter LOVES these Dolls
customer_reviews.text: We have our first trip with the grandkids to Disney coming up. We got the 2 yr old these dolls to get her familiar with all the princesses. She’s played with them every day. She dresses like them now. Her parents had to limit her to just two in the car. Definitely her favorite toy(s) now. They’re Barbie size and great.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy I

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The box is so cute and my little sister love them all. I got good quality and quantity for not too much money.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Princesses
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 year old grand daughter. I believe she will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great collection of dolls!
customer_reviews.text: These went very well with the Barbie Dream House! My daughter was very happy on Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter went insane! She lived this gift. The dolls are wonderful and if you check prices on each, this set is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Karyn L. Moriel

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves these dolls
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was delighted with this gift. E plays with the dolls all the time an loves them. I recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: Susan  Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Price and playability
customer_reviews.text: I could never dislike this product. The dolls are great. My girls love playing with them, and the price was too good to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: KJVA87

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Perfect barbies for my daughter definitely look like the princesses and are NOT cheap quality
customer_reviews.author: Molly Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: I could not possibly say enough about how pleased I was with this set! My Granddaughter loves them. I will be buying this again for my other Granddaughters. This is a great investment well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size perfect Christmas present!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old granddaughter. Her face just lit up when she opened her Christmas present. She loved it so I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Red320

customer_reviews.title: Pack of princesses
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo loved them. She was so excited to see all of these princesses together

customer_reviews.title: Nice collection but low quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice collection but the dolls look a bit cheap except Moana.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for your princess!!
customer_reviews.text: This was for my granddaughters main Christmas gift and she loves them!!!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderment

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The dollars looks really nice don’t know about durability bought this for a Christmas gift for my daughter

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute but their hair all started to tangle up immediately after being unboxed. This does not happen with other Disney barbies that we have.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dolls
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. My granddaughters love them. They are very pretty and seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Shoes don’t stay on easily I would leave the elastic on
customer_reviews.text: Are the perfectly made in their original outfits? No! But the dresses are made for there them and they look pretty good for the price u pay u get a lot of them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: My girls are in love with these dolls! They are nonstop playing, brushing hair and switching out accessories. Worth every penny! Well made dolls, cute and distinct facial features. Just wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice collection.
customer_reviews.text: My one daughter wanted this for Christmas. Exactly as advertised. She loved it. Was a slight pain to open. The dolls have a thousand times on them.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Got for my daughters for Christmas they play with them every day Sadly the hair is a little thinner than most dolls but that hasn’t seemed to bother them

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dolls!
customer_reviews.text: These dolls are absolutely beautiful. I was shocked when I opened them. Huge hit with my niece for Christmas. She LOVED them.

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for sisters
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty expensive, but the dolls are nice! It’s a good big gift or a gift for sisters where they can share them all.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dolls
customer_reviews.text: These dolls are still intact since Christmas and my daughter's love them. I'm happy with my purchase and they were a great gift.

customer_reviews.title: Great dolls!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves these! The bodies are realistic female bodies. Great for young girls to see.

customer_reviews.title: So pretty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: My little princess loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My little princess loves it! Very detailed clothing and shoes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my niece for her birthday. She was extremely happy. She loves them as well as the classic.

customer_reviews.title: Real look
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my nieces and they love it. Barbies do look like a real characters.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter who is 3 years old, loved this gift. Every time we went into the store she would go right to it and tell me that these belong in her home. She was right. She loved them all

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Gift for 3rd birthday. Shared with sister (5) they adore it

customer_reviews.title: Disney knockoff not authentic looking
customer_reviews.text: The legs are strange,says it's made from Disney but looks like a knockoff

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality doll set. My 3 yr old daughter was stoked when she received this gift.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was absolutely happy with her dolls.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these dolls for my daughter for Christmas and she absolutely adored them. She loves that she can switch the clothes,shoes, and accessories.

customer_reviews.title: Great little dolls!
customer_reviews.text: Great little dolls for a princess loving little girl. So far they are holding up great to all the playtime they are getting!

customer_reviews.title: Came as pictured. Good quality.

product_meta.title: Disney Princess Royal Collection, 12 Fashion Dolls -- Ariel, Aurora, Belle, Cinderella, Jasmine, Merida, Moana, Mulan, Pocahontas, Rapunzel, Snow White, Tiana (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description:
Kids can play out their favorite adventures from Disney movies with this complete collection of 12 Disney Princess dolls with dresses and shoes. The royal collection includes Disney's Ariel, Aurora, Belle, Cinderella, Jasmine, Merida, Mulan, Pocahontas, Rapunzel, snow white, and Tiana. Also included is Disney's Moana of Oceania! Each doll in the set comes dressed in their beautiful, movie-inspired outfit. Complete their looks with dazzling fashion accessories, including 2 Belts, 3 headbands, 2 necklaces, 1 tiara, and 11 pairs of shoes. This complete Disney Princess doll collection makes a great toy For kids 3 years old and up who love Disney movies. Collect other Disney Princess dolls and playsets (each sold separately) and pretend to journey to worlds where adventure and imagination reign!

hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: 12 Disney dolls in 1 set: includes 12 dolls in 1 pack for a complete doll collection -- Ariel, Aurora, Belle, Cinderella, Jasmine, Merida, Mulan, Pocahontas, Rapunzel, snow white, and Tiana. Also includes, Disney's Moana
Disney dolls with dresses and fashion accessories: doll set includes signature dresses and accessories for each fashion doll
Disney dolls with shoes: 11 pairs of shoes for dolls included
Fashion dolls make a great present: your kid will love receiving this doll collection for a birthday gift or holiday present
Toy for 3 year olds: any kid who loves the vast collection of animated Disney movies will love these fashion dolls

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars602 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
